Kentwood.West Michigan Aviation Academy:
West Michigan Aviation Academy (WMAA) is a charter high school in Grand Rapids, Michigan.


== History ==
In 2010, pilot and billionaire Dick DeVos established WMAA on the suggestion of his wife, Betsy DeVos. The initial enrollment of 80 students assembled for the Fall term of 2010 in a warehouse of 25,000 square feet (2,300 m2) in proximity to Gerald R. Ford International Airport.
